.. _amdgpu_synid_gfx7_tgt:

tgt
===

An export target:

    ================== ===================================
    Syntax             Description
    ================== ===================================
    pos{0..3}          Copy vertex position 0..3.
    param{0..31}       Copy vertex parameter 0..31.
    mrt{0..7}          Copy pixel color to the MRTs 0..7.
    mrtz               Copy pixel depth (Z) data.
    null               Copy nothing.
    ================== ===================================

Examples:

.. parsed-literal::

  exp pos3 v1, v2, v3, v4
  exp mrt0 v1, v2, v3, v4
